stateDiagram

IDLE

IDLE : IDLE

state ACITVE_GROUP {

        PAUSED

        PAUSED : PAUSED

        state ACITVE_GROUP.(ChoicePoint)(RESUMING) <>

        state BUSY_GROUP {

                CACHING

                CACHING : CACHING

                CACHING : enter / #123; cacheAttachment() #125;

                CREATING

                CREATING : CREATING

                CREATING : enter / #123; createResource() #125;

                CREATING : didCreateResource / #123; notifyAttachmentCreated() #125;

                CALCULATING

                CALCULATING : CALCULATING

                CALCULATING : enter / #123; calculateFileSize() #125;

                CALCULATING : 1. didCalculateFileSize / #123; resetUploadStatus() #125;

                UPLOADING

                UPLOADING : UPLOADING

                UPLOADING : enter / #123; sendFileChunk() #125;

                UPLOADING : 1. didUploadChunk / #123; updateUploadStatus(vars.chunkSize) #125;

                UPLOADING : 2. didUploadChunk / #123; notifyUploadProgress() #125;

                SENDING

                SENDING : SENDING

                SENDING : enter / #123; sendMessage() #125;

                SENDING : didSendMessage / #123; notifyMessageSent() #125;

        }

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

IDLE --> CACHING : send [hasAttachment(vars.message)]

IDLE --> SENDING : send [!hasAttachment(vars.message)]

ACITVE_GROUP --> IDLE : cancel

ACITVE_GROUP --> IDLE : didFail

PAUSED --> ACITVE_GROUP.(ChoicePoint)(RESUMING) : resume

ACITVE_GROUP.(ChoicePoint)(RESUMING) --> CREATING : [!hasResourceId(vars.message)]

ACITVE_GROUP.(ChoicePoint)(RESUMING) --> CALCULATING : else

ACITVE_GROUP.(ChoicePoint)(RESUMING) --> UPLOADING : [vars.fileOffset > 0]

BUSY_GROUP --> PAUSED : pause

CACHING --> CREATING : didCacheAttachment

CREATING --> CALCULATING : didCreateResource [vars.fileSize > 0]

CREATING --> SENDING : didCreateResource [vars.fileSize == 0]

CALCULATING --> UPLOADING : didCalculateFileSize

UPLOADING --> UPLOADING : didUploadChunk [vars.fileOffset < vars.fileSize]

UPLOADING --> SENDING : didUploadChunk [vars.fileOffset >= vars.fileSize]

SENDING --> IDLE : didSendMessage

ROOT.(InitialState) --> IDLE
Events
settings
